overview: Kommissar Rex (English title: Inspector Rex, Italian title: Il commissario Rex) is an Austrian police procedural drama[1] aired from 1994 to 2004. In 2008 the series was revived under Austro-Italian production, and has since 2009 been made fully in Italy, with occasional episodes set in Austria. The Austro-Italian production was cancelled in June 2015 by RAI after 8 Italian seasons.[2] (from wikipedia)
title: Inspector Rex
